detect.title: Detect QR Code
detect.description: Due to the static nature of GitHub Pages, server-side operations such as QR code detection, which require computational resources and external libraries, cannot be executed in this environment. To overcome this limitation, cross-platform native applications were developed for Windows, Linux, and macOS. These tools, collectively referred to as QRebuild, are distributed as self-contained executables in both command-line (CLI) and graphical (GUI) variants. QRebuild is designed to process image input locally and reconstruct the embedded QR code using platform-native performance.
